item.title: ergo安装ingress安装
item.author: root@ysicing.net (ysicing)
item.description: 域名相关 默认情况下, 本地环境域名测试 *.k7s.xyz 11.11.11.111 *.slb.k7s.xyz 11.11.11.112 *.vlb.k7s.xyz 11.11.11.113 ergo安装 Usage: ergo install ingress [flags] Flags: -h, --help help for ingress --ingresstype string ingress: nginx-ingress, traefik, ingress-nginx (default "ingress-nginx") Global Flags: --config string config file (default is $HOME/.doge/config.yaml) --ip strings 需要安装节点ip (default [11.11.11.111])
item.dc:creator: ysicing
